subject: Basketball
Computers and the Internet
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Stephon Marbury was uncensored and unfiltered Friday as he took to the Internet and tried to host a 24-hour live chat with viewers from his Los Angeles residence.
snippet: Stephon Marbury was uncensored and unfiltered Friday as he took to the Internet and tried to host a 24-hour live chat with viewers from his Los Angeles residence.
